entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
